float.name: timeline_extra_duration
float.description: Extra time in seconds after the last animation keyframe.

file.name: map_image_path
file.description: Select a minimap image as the background for the sitrep.

float.name: playable_width
float.description: Playable width of the map. This is used when positionning elements. A value of 100 will give a range of -50 to 50.

float.name: playable_height
float.description: Playable height of the map. This is used when positionning elements. A value of 100 will give a range of -50 to 50.

file.name: narrative_collection
file.description: Only used by the Sitrep Editor. Select a collection of narrative events for narration preview.

string.name: narrative_event
string.description: Only used by the Sitrep Editor. Select a narrative event from the narrative collection for narration preview.

int.name: narrative_variant
int.description: Only used by the Sitrep Editor. Select a narrative variant to preview. Some events have more than one variant. 0 or more to select a variant. -1 to disable narration preview.
